summary: Get rid of all that excess weight and clutter by combining your little health, stamina, or magicka potions into bigger ones.  No loss of potency -- just pour them together at the nearest cooking pot.
descriptionHtml:
A simple mod that allows you to combine your weaker health, magicka, or stamina potions into stronger ones via a Cooking Pot.  There\'s no loss of potency.

Examples:
Potion of Minor Healing (25) + Potion of Minor Healing (25) = Potion of Healing (50)
Potion of Stamina (50) + Potion of Vigorous Stamina (100) = Potion of Extreme Stamina (150)

Just use the Cooking Pot with your potions in hand, and remember to select the MISC section for the potion recipes.

Fully compatible with mods that alter potion weight, name, etc. (as is demonstrated by the screenshot, in which I\'m using Better Sorting).

[u]-Installation-[/u]
Place Eld-combinePotions.esp into your Data folder, and enable it using your preferred mod manager.

[u]-Credits-[/u]
Thanks to Dave Humphrey for SkyEdit.
